message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $200. I believe it offers a lot of value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $180. Can you meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $190?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $175. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  $185 is my final offer, I think it's a fair compromise.
I'm not sure I can go that high. I was thinking more along the lines of $180, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $182.50?
